DOC.brief_summary: Some study suggest acupuncture improve flow mediate dilation ( FMD ) represent endothelial function , study investigate whether acupuncture protect ischemia reperfusion ( IR ) -induced endothelial dysfunction human . This prospective crossover study clinical trial . In first crossover study , 20 healthy nonsmoking volunteer ( 25 40 year old ) randomly assign acupuncture control . Endothelium-dependent , FMD brachial artery measure IR ( 15 minute ischemia level proximal upper arm follow 15 minute reperfusion ) . Acupuncture perform 10 minute ischemia till end time reperfusion 20 minute . In second single arm study , 16 volunteer administer oral 5mg glibenclamide two hour IR injury ( n=8 ) selective cox-2 inhibitor celecoxib 200mg twice day 5 day know mechanism responsible acupuncture effect IR injury . FMD measurement acupuncture intervention IR injury mention .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Acupuncture Endothelial Dysfunction Induced Ischemia-reperfusion Injury
DOC.criteria: healthy volunteer age 25 40 year nonsmoker hypertension ( > 140/90 mmHg ) , diabetes cardiovascular disease kidney disease thyroid disease cerebrovascular disease liver disease ( bilirubin level > 2 mg/dl ) pregnancy body mass index > 25 kg/m2
